cm.model
Class EffectBase

java.lang.Object
  cm.model.EffectBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<EffectBase>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Effect
public class EffectBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<EffectBase>

Defines the basic attributes of an effect (e.g., dazed, blinded, etc.) in D&D 4e.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Rinehart <gomamon2k at yahoo.com>

          Defines possible effect durations in D&D 4e.
